text: Meridith Kohut (born 1983) is an American photojournalist. She won a 2018 Courage in Journalism Award and 2016 George Polk Award. She was a finalist for the 2018 Pulitzer Prize in Feature Photography. She graduated from the University of Texas School of Journalism. She reported from Venezuela for the New York Times. == References == Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:American photojournalists Category:George Polk Award winners
title: Meridith Kohut
